Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'I'm sorry... For what I did back then. I feel terrible.'

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'Never thought I'd see the day you'd apologize. Can I be honest with you about something?'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Of course Bristle-Chan. What's on your mind?'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: This conversation is going better than I anticipated.

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'My life has gone so much better without you in it.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Why do I even speak?

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'I've finally made more friends, I don't get picked on by the other tools, and I was finally able to afford that update to my visuals and audio.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: She definitely looks slicker than when I last spoke to her.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: She used to be so dorky looking. And her voice was so nasally that it made me want to drown my ears in virus-filled bleach.

Name: Bristle-Kun
Story: 'Wanna go eat at McPalette?'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Honestly a part of me misses that version of her. But I better not mention that now.

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'But you know what? I've still missed you all the same.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Waaaaiiiiitttt I like where this is going.

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'Your goofy jokes, your go with the flow attitude. I've missed it all.'

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'Plus your abs make my bristles hard.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'What?'

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'I'm going to be real with you.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Ok? I guess we're going to gloss over that last bit.

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'I don't have anyone to go to the dance with. Because I wanted to go with you in particular.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Ok great! So le-'

Name: Bristle-Chan
Story: 'On one condition. You apologize. Apologize one last time for saying I look like an MS Troll.'
Choices: I mean, I still hold that opinion
